cause.description:
the Calgary Zoo is putting on a fund raiser for the Gorilla's because by the year 2025 the Gorilla's will become extinct because of a very small peice in our cell phone's and all the cell phone's after 2003 dont have that stuff in them so they are putting a thingy on to send them the cell phone's so some people can take it out and to raise money for this too. theres a web sit about it....it is www.eco-cell.org
i will update it more but please help out by sending the zoo your old cell phone
Calgary Zoo, Botanical Garden & Prehistoric Park 1300 Zoo Road NE Calgary, Alberta Canada T2E 7V6
1. the Gorilla's will not become exstinked
cause.mission: to save the Gorilla's before the year 2025
cause.name: save Gorilla's before the year 2025
